website_summaries.verdict: Keep your cast iron pans at their absolute best and shred through leftover bacon or chicken fat with this inexpensive, sturdy, and surprisingly effective cast iron cleaner.
pros: Great for cleaning up while camping

customer_reviews.title: Useful and endurable
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product and I highly recommend it. I was having a hard time washing my cast iron pans. It works incredibly well to remove the burnt crud or any other remaining residue without soaking! Quite convenient and it seems very endurable!
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive because it works and cleans like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Cleans the cast iron with ease. Leaves the seasoning, and it can be thrown in the dishwasher coming out sparkling clean. Looks interesting hanging as it looks like chainmail and decorative using some imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for Cast Iron!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for cleaning a cast iron griddle that is used on top of our gas grill for meats, etc. We found the griddle difficult to clean without this, and our son, the BBQ King, highly recommended this. We purchased it and it's been a wonderful time-saver. It's sturdy, easy to clean and works wonders quickly on the griddle which is generally quite a mess after grilling meats on it. We highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Becky R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Cast Iron and Steel
customer_reviews.text: I switched away from aluminum cookware awhile back and purchased my first chainmail scrubber. Great for the wok and other steel products too! Powers through stuck on bits of food without clogging and cleans up beautifully. Staying with a girlfriend and had to buy one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: WHAT TOOK ME SO LONG
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to eliminate all cook ware beyond Cast Iron, Glass and some stainless. I have Cast Iron skillets that belonged to my Grandmother (over 100 Years old). Love that the traditional is holding true - and healthy. This is the very best way to clean Cast Iron. And learned can also be used on annoying difficult to clean waffle irons. Have just ordered 2 more as gifts and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Gray Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this earlier
customer_reviews.text: This makes cleaning cast iron skillets a whole lot easier than before. This is made well and it really does a great job when cleaning up the pans after cooking. For clean up, I put some soap in my hands and rub the soap throughout the scrubber to get the grease off of it and it cleans up well. The just hang it to dry before putting it away. Glad I got this and would purchase it again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: mkesales

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I cant believe I didnt know about this product before. It cleans fast, perfect, no scratches on pans or my hands. And amazingly itself stays totally clean and odor free. Just lovely!!!
customer_reviews.author: Duenwen Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but gets hot when scrubbing a hot pan
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product does what it is supposed to but It gets hots. With cast iron pans, you're supposed to clean it right after you're done cooking so the pot will still be hot. There isn't a barrier between your scrubber and your hands so the heat transfers. I've decided to get a different scrubber so I don't risk burning my self trying to clean a cast iron.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to get anything stuck to my cast iron pan I can't get off with this. After each use I wash it with dish soap, rinse it and hang it and it looks like I just bought it so far a couple months after purchasing. Most annoying thing I've burnt into it is salmon skin and it came right off with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Effective
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using a chainmail scrubber, and I will never go back! Though I was a bit dubious of the effectiveness at first, I can't believe how well it worked. It literally took seconds to clean pots that before would require some soaking and several minutes of scrubbing!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Buckholt

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Guardian Angel
customer_reviews.text: If you have cast iron pots/skillets, but you do not have this....you need to get it. It cuts down cleaning time and actually does way better than any other kind of brush/sponge/ect. These things are spectacular. Just remember to use salt rather than soap and you are golden!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea. That chainmail scrubber It’s so easy to use and leaves the pan’s surface perfectly clean without removing the seasoning. Just put some hot water in the pan, let it sit for a few minutes, empty out most of the water, scrub, rinse and you’re done.
customer_reviews.author: James Coker

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to clean my cast iron pans! I liked it so much that I bought on for my daughter to use on her case iron pans!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Meisenheimer

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly messy and a pain to clean. I got this hoping to forever ditch steel wool for cleaning cast iron. While it does a fine job of discarding large residue from my pan, the chainmail holds into any grease and fat. It was a nuisance to clean the chainmail right after using it to clean the pan, and it often left my hands filthy. It also didn't do a very good job of clearing small residue from the pan. Unless you want to spend five minutes cleaning your cast iron every time it's used, look elsewhere. After about two weeks I went back to steel wool.
customer_reviews.author: John D Butler

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love cleaning my cast iron skillet with this. It scrapes up all the grime and then just wash it in soapy water and hang to dry. I put a small command hook on the side of my refrigerator so it is always handy. Then season your skillet and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Yngsdal

customer_reviews.title: Cast Iron Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: With warm water and this chainmail everything get clean. Best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Scrub a dub chainmail!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I am handling a piece of medieval chainmail while I’m scrubbing my cast iron pans. The thing works great but it catches a lot of the grease on it. Put it in the dishwasher and it’s good as new! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: thomasf

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it really works
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of positive reviews for this, so maybe I'm doing it wrong, but the mail doesn't clean my pan any better than a sponge or brush. It is well made and so far hasn't rusted. I just can't justify the practicality of it.
customer_reviews.author: ClaytonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and effective
customer_reviews.text: This little guy has saved our nice cast iron pans and our plancha while still keeping them clean. It is very well made and an ideal size. (Does make a scary noise when it falls off the edge of the sink and into the stainless steel basin in the middle of the night.) The little ring on the corner is perfect for hanging it up to dry. A necessity for any kitchen with cast iron tools.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fouts

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty quality item
customer_reviews.text: Simple product that works great. 100% stainless steel. Nice and heavy duty feel to it and easy to clean. Gets the stuck food particles off my Field fry pan and love the loop to hang it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job on all my cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t hang up well but it does such a great job I just drape it over a cutting board. I have had one for awhile and I just ordered four more for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: It makes cleaning a cast iron frying pan easy.
customer_reviews.text: I had one, but it was lost during a recent move. This is identical to the one I lost. I am happy. As far as I know there is nothing better to clean a cast iron frying pan (the King of all frying pans).
customer_reviews.author: John N

customer_reviews.title: Cleans cast iron
customer_reviews.text: This works great to clean the hard stuck on food on cast iron. If you need to clean the grease off just put it in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised it worked so well
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was a bit skeptical that this scrubber would work. I love my iron pans and have been searching for an easy way to clean them. This stainless steel mesh scrubber works like a dream. After using iron skillet (while pan is still hot) I run the pan under hot water and scrub with the mesh. Effortless and no dish soap needed. Dry pan and I use small amount of coconut oil to prepare for next use. Easy, peasy. Wash mesh scrubber with dish soap, rinse and let dry.
customer_reviews.author: Andreas

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this is the best tool to clean your cast iron. when i realized cast iron is the most superior method of cooking i needed something to clean it well. this gets all the blackened scum off your pan. warm water and a bit of mild soap is all you need with your steel scrubber
customer_reviews.author: soo

customer_reviews.title: I'm a fan
customer_reviews.text: After having a wooden handle break on us we decided to give this a try. I really like that it can't break and that I can really get into smaller grooves. Don't suspect I'll need another but if I did this would be my choice.
customer_reviews.author: I. E. Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this for cleaning ANY cast iron cookware. Takes the stuck on food/seasoning particles off super easily with not much need for elbow grease.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vicknair

customer_reviews.title: no real difference than scrubber sponge
customer_reviews.text: can't really tell that it gets my cast iron pans any cleaner, or cleans any easier than plain old hot water and a scrubber sponge
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of the mess and having to constantly throw out scouring pads. This is a great quality product that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Better than using sand
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to use this instead of cleaning my cast iron with sand or scouring pad
customer_reviews.author: Carrol Cass

customer_reviews.title: If you have a cast iron pan this is a great tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for cleaning my lodge pan. It makes getting egg or greasy bits off really easy, and then rinses clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed!!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a way to clean my cast iron skillet without having to use soap or a sponge (rendering the sponge useless or ruining the “cured” finish of the pan!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Philip P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Tough little scrubber that babies cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scrubber. Cleans cast iron the way it should be and the scrubber washes up easily. We have used it to clean our stainless steel pans too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zamparelli

customer_reviews.title: A handy cast iron scrubber.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a handy little item that helps with cast iron cleaning. One of my pans had heavier than expected rust and it was hard to clean the ridges, but it worked well for even moderate rust.
customer_reviews.author: Goldgeller

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have used this product to clean my cast-iron pans only a handful of times and the links are already coming undone. A few more fall off every time I use it and has the potential to ruin my garbage disposal. Will be throwing it away and ordering a different one. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will never clean cast iron with anything else!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product! I will never clan cast iron with anything else. I've bought 3 so far. Note- a garbage disposal will win a fight with this, and it's an easy product to repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle wood

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Does a wonderful job cleaning cast iron without removing the precious patina! Cleans easily in the dishwasher....
customer_reviews.author: tbnIck

customer_reviews.title: Amazeballs
customer_reviews.text: Great investment for anyone regularly cooking on cast iron. Works on all pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Graybeer'd tha pirate

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea I was making clean so difficult with cast iron pans. This product is such a time saver, my pans have never been this clean.
customer_reviews.author: Taitano

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Life changer. I hated cleaning my cast iron pans but this product makes it super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Rinni

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We have had a cast iron pan for many years and this is the best way to clean this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I bought because I liked it well enough to leave at our cabin where we have several cast iron pans & Dutch ovens. But I had to get another one for our home because my husband loves it to clean our smoker and BBQ grates.
customer_reviews.author: Patti M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cast iron!
customer_reviews.text: Really a great product if you have cast iron! Cleans very well and doesn’t effect the seasoning.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cast Iron
customer_reviews.text: Pour some kosher salt in your cast iron and scrub it out with this bad boy. No need for water. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Does not harm the seasoned iron skillet.
customer_reviews.text: I like having a special cleaner for my treasured iron skillets that cleans without harming. Doesn’t contain any detergents or cleansers that might take away the seasoned surface.
customer_reviews.author: Alexia Gale

customer_reviews.title: What a great way to clean cast iron!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It truly is a quick and easy way to clean cast iron pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: T. D. Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Works great with salt
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I always ruined my sponges trying to clean my skillet. A little salt and this pad works amazing. Only downside if you leave it on the edge of the sink it will rust the sink. I used a little command hook to hang mine up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! Easy to use...Very effective! Got my daughter one!
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cleaning cast iron! No soap residue and impossible to ruin!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Blase

customer_reviews.title: Affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Son really liked this he uses his cast-iron every day
customer_reviews.author: pap

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot scrubber! No need for Brillo or SOS!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brandley

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Does ex as crly what I sh ok uldndo. Cleans cast irons
customer_reviews.author: Ben Leigh

customer_reviews.title: cleans the pan not itself
customer_reviews.text: Still not sure if this is the best way to clean my new cast iron frying pan. Still have to really scrub. No scratches or anything like that and it is sturdy. The problem is trying to clean the scrubber itself. It gets covered in grease from cooking and won't come off
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Brudi

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It’s perfect for cleaning your cast iron. And it cleans way better than other materials I’ve used (steel wool). I’m cooking with my cast iron skillet a lot more now that the cleaning process is significantly easier. Very happy with this little tool.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Wish I had one of these a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: cvc

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time after cooking with my cast iron and it gets any bit of grime off 100%. Would definitely recommend. Helps if you wrap it around a sponge but its not completely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: scottbryden

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: It even gets the burnt popcorn off the bottom of my pan.
customer_reviews.author: C. Muir

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well without damaging my cast iron cookware!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found this item. It cleans my cast iron cookware very well!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: What a life saver for my cast iron. I couple it with a sponge for a bit more grip and it works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Retain Your Cast Iron’s Seasoning Longer
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It has changed my cast iron care forever for the better. It cleans well and the seasoning on my skillet lasts much longer than it did before.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Yandell

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of use (approximately once per week) the links have begun to fall off and are ending up in my garbage disposal! I would not recommend purchasing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: A must have for cast iron cook ware owners
customer_reviews.text: It makes cleaning easy and does not damage the cast iron
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good but, scratches/strips the coating
customer_reviews.text: Lodge made a great scrubber you can buy on amazon that works better than this. It won't strip your coating and it is pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great as long as it doesn't end up in the garbage disposable, it lost that fight.
customer_reviews.author: Austin J

customer_reviews.title: Chain links feel study
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple times on my skillet and makes cleaning so much easier. Definitely feels thicker and more durable than other ones I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Okay but falls apart
customer_reviews.text: The product works great to clean but medal rings fall off into the sink while scrubbing. Not recommended especially for those with garbage disposals.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Never knew these existed!! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as it is suppose to!! Cast iron pans are all clean now!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: It works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Chain links are butted, not welded. This may effect the longevity. Been using almost daily for a few weeks and no sign of breaking down yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing- so much better than brush style options
customer_reviews.text: Game changer if you own an iron skillet. Seems weird but I promise it’s way better than any of the brush style options. Gets everything off your iron skillet super easily without damaging it and it doesn’t get grease stuck on it like wire brushes I have used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Works great to clean cast iron
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Also ordered one for my son and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying these for friends with cast iron skillets
customer_reviews.author: Millie Judd

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is designed to do and cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: Cast iron pans are notoriously tricky to use and also clean. This is a game changer when cleaning your pan after use. It gets everything off effortlessly and very little elbow grease. I love it. Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Klud

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a lot of chance to use it but happy with it so far. It removes burnt on areas without scraping through seasoning
customer_reviews.author: Marty Senetra

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Great for removing tough gritty foods from the cast iron pans.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Skillet savior
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had ruined my cast iron skillet forever when it rusted. Then I found this and it's like I got a brand new skillet for myself!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I could've bought for the cast iron pan. There is no need for elbow greasy to harm the seasoning. A gentle wipe will do the trick. Great product will last as long as the cast iron!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Miller

customer_reviews.title: Originally I thought I didn't receive this...
customer_reviews.text: well someone set aside the envelope it was in and I didn't discover it for months... but, once I did... wow, it works GREAT on iron pans... as advertised... it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I was at a loss on what was the best thing to clean my cast iron pan. This product solved that problem. Super easy to use, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Finally got a replacement
customer_reviews.text: I had one before. They work great. My last one got lost in a move. This one is equal to the old one -- works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for cast iron
customer_reviews.text: Works so freakin well. I can't believe I didn't buy one sooner
customer_reviews.author: Reflexxtra

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to clean cast iron
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest way to clean a cast iron pan, just scrub then clean the chain mail. Follow up with a cloth and light oil.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Benner

customer_reviews.title: I like this product
customer_reviews.text: smaller than I thought, cleaned really well with some elbow grease. Scrubber was harder to clean after use but that maybe because I had a lot of grease build up on my skillet.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Tresner

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Somewhat difficult to clean the grease off of it, but that’s probably because my pans needed a lot of attention. Overall happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and works...
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my newly acquired cast iron pans; wok, 12 in. and 15 in. pan. Seems durable and strong reminds me of warrior chain mail. Appears like this product will last as long as the pans.
customer_reviews.author: XtremeFit.P

customer_reviews.title: The way to clean cast iron
customer_reviews.text: This is the way to clean cast iron pots! Easy to use, I like the hook for hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Emelyne S

customer_reviews.title: Order this!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use while cleaning my cast iron pans. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: B. Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Seriously the best thing that happened to me - buying these pans. I "seasoned" them again just in case and they are so incredibly non-stick its amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Di Domenico

customer_reviews.title: Great except some of the links
customer_reviews.text: Some of the links are not all the way connected causing them to scratch the pan a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah B. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any other scrubber I have tried. Best part, you can wash out the grease and debris from the scrubber quickly and easily. No more gooey scrubbers.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Wise

customer_reviews.title: Clean your cast iron pans easily
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to keep your cast iron in tip-top shape.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great without tearing up my hands and fingernails like steel wool

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My brother was the one telling people about it. I used it with a 3 pack of cleaning product and it worked great.

customer_reviews.title: Will be asking for a refund
customer_reviews.text: Product fell apart- rings started falling off the main piece of the tool- had to throw away. Should’ve spent the extra few dollars for The Ringer.

customer_reviews.title: Right tools for the job
customer_reviews.text: Just drop it in while the skillet is still hot and use a plastic brush to move it in circles, soap or no soap, it works everytime!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my cast iron pans to get any stuck food.

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars!!

product_meta.title: Ationgle 8"x6" Stainless Steel Cast Iron Cleaner 316L Chainmail Scrubber for Cast Iron Pan Pre-Seasoned Pan Dutch Ovens Waffle Iron Pans
feature_bullets: 🍳Clean your cast iron pans with the uniquely designed chainmail that allows for safe treatment of pans
🍳Our chainmail scrubber is made with high-grade stainless steel that resists rust and tarnish for optimal longevity
🍳Use the scrubber instead of the steel wool cleaner to preserve the tempering of your seasoned cast iron
🍳8 by 6 inches scrubber doesn't take up much space in a drawer. It is easy to hang on a hook near your sink for its next use with ease

🍳Please note that Ationgle is the only authorized seller of this Chainmail Scrubber, so make sure you purchase from Ationgle! We have a 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE if you get a defective or damaged product.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars987 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
